release_note: Fixed an issue where images would not appear
Support for the latest iOS and devices
Support for dark mode Support for new iOS gestures
Fixed an intermittent issue with thumbnail generation.
Pencil 2 double tap: Double tap on the Pencil 2 to toggle between the eraser and drawing.
Improved text editor layout on iPhone X.
Improved ink tracking with Apple Pencil
Shape recognizer Noteflow : Tap the Straight Line tool when selected to toggle shape recognizer mode and draw perfect circles triangles and squares.
Improved drag and drop into other apps Improved ink
Smoother Ink: Improved vector ink rendering. High res export Noteflow : Toggle in app settings for 4x resolution exports.

Transparent PNGs: Transparency is now preserved when inserting a transparent PNG. Pencil Only Mode panning: To avoid unintended touches a single finger will no longer pan but you can still pan and zoom with two fingers.
